ygData.subject: Re: Factions
ygData.msgSnippet: While we are on factions, I have a non-warrior related request for everyone. As another character, I play a Dark Elf Shadow Knight.  Again, on the Bertoxx
ygData.messageBody:
While we are on factions, I have a non-warrior related request for everyone.
As another character, I play a Dark Elf Shadow Knight. Again, on the Bertoxx
server. I left Neriak at level 3, and traveled to the land of Faydwer. I
got an invis, and ran to CB cave, hopping to raise my faction enough to allow
me into the city. Alas, I am now level 12, and I have recently been informed
that I can NEVER change the faction with the elves. Somewhat upset, I
arranged for an invis to the dwarven lands, in hopes of acceptance there.
But, as the time for my departure drew near, I ambandoned leaving, refusing
to belive nothing could be done. So, I decided to start a petition of sorts
to help change this. So, what I propose is that they allow me to change my
faction standings, just make it take a while. I know humans are not looked
upon as the greatest of friends to the elves, so let's say that it takes 200
orc kills for them to go from one fac level to the next. So, make if 400
orcs for me to go from one to the next. Or maybe more like 600. Make it
hard, but not impossable. Anyway, I ask you to sent them feedback asking for
this, because I would like to be able to walk outside without a guard walking
by and killing me.
